tool_description: Processes large batches of scheduled reminders efficiently with queue management and rate limiting.

reminder_batch_data.description: JSON string containing batch of reminder data

processing_priority.description: Processing priority: low, normal, high, urgent

rate_limit_per_minute.description: Maximum number of reminders to process per minute

enable_parallel_processing.description: Whether to enable parallel processing for faster execution

error_threshold_percentage.description: Percentage of errors before stopping batch processing

channel_distribution.description: Preferred channel distribution: email, sms, push

error_messages: Invalid batch data: Provide valid JSON string for reminder_batch_data parameter.
Empty reminder batch: Batch must contain at least one reminder to process.
Invalid processing priority: Use low, normal, high, or urgent for processing_priority.
Invalid rate limit: rate_limit_per_minute must be between 1 and 1000.
Invalid error threshold: error_threshold_percentage must be between 0 and 50.
Batch processing failed: Critical error occurred during batch processing.
Invalid channel distribution: Use only email, sms, or push in channel_distribution array.
usage: Provide reminder_batch_data as JSON string. Optionally configure processing_priority, rate_limit_per_minute, enable_parallel_processing, error_threshold_percentage, and channel_distribution. Returns batch processing results and statistics.

batch_id.description: Unique identifier for the processed batch

processing_time_seconds.description: Total time taken to process the batch

error_rate_percentage.description: Percentage of reminders that failed delivery
